banner.title: Reliable. Scalable. Data-Driven Logistics
banner.description: Delia UG provides structured fleet solutions and professional driver services for businesses seeking reliable, efficient last-mile delivery. We combine operational excellence with transparent communication and data-driven performance analysis.

join_network_section.heading: Join the Network — as a Driver or Partner
join_network_section.description: Delia UG provides structured fleet solutions and professional driver services for companies seeking reliable and efficient delivery operations. Transparent, fair, and data-driven systems for drivers, fleet owners, and partners.

features.fleet_solutions: Fleet Solutions — Complete hiring and operations service.
features.driver_network: Driver & Partner Network — Verified drivers and trusted partners.
features.fleet_insights: Fleet Insights — Data-driven performance and route tracking.
features.collaboration: Transparent Collaboration — Clear contracts and open communication.

why_work.title: Why Work With Us?
why_work.description: Delia acts as an external operations partner so that companies don’t need to build their own fleet management. We provide reliable operations, data-backed improvements, and a transparent partnership model that grows with your business.

drivers.title: For Drivers & Fleet Owners
points: Become part of a reliable logistics network.
Clear coordination, regular work, and fast payments.

services_section.title: Our Core Services
services_section.description: Delia UG offers reliability, scalability, and efficiency across all levels of logistics — powered by technology and data-driven performance.

last_mile_delivery.title: Last-Mile Delivery
last_mile_delivery.description: Reliable and fast last-mile delivery solutions for companies that demand punctual performance and customer satisfaction.

fleet_management.title: Fleet Management
fleet_management.description: Comprehensive fleet solutions including driver management, tracking, and performance analytics for operational excellence.

international_coverage.title: International Coverage
international_coverage.description: Cross-border logistics support across Europe — managing compliance, documentation, and coordination professionally.

support_24_7.title: 24/7 Support
support_24_7.description: Our dedicated team ensures your deliveries and operations never stop — available day and night for all logistics inquiries.

contact_section.title: Let’s Talk Logistics
contact_section.description: Whether courier, fleet, or company — we offer structured, transparent, and data-driven logistics solutions.

onboarding.title: Onboarding Team
onboarding.description: For assistance with applications or document submissions.

support.title: Fleet & Courier Support
support.description: For active partners or couriers needing assistance.

general.title: General Inquiries
general.description: For press, partnerships, or general questions.

about_section.title: About Delia UG
about_section.description: Delia UG is a Bonn-based logistics company founded in 2024, focusing on structured, technology-driven last-mile delivery operations. We help businesses grow efficiently by managing fleets, drivers, and operations with transparency and measurable performance.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To deliver reliable fleet and driver management through structured operations, transparent communication, and data-based performance — ensuring consistency, trust, and efficiency for every client.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To become Germany’s most trusted partner for fleet operations — empowering businesses, drivers, and partners to achieve sustainable growth through collaboration and innovation.

details.title: About Details
details.description: Delia UG operates as an external logistics partner, offering complete outsourcing solutions for fleets. From driver management to data analytics, our services are designed to optimize routes, improve delivery accuracy, and reduce operational costs. Focused on fairness and transparency, Delia UG builds long-term partnerships supported by measurable performance data.

footer.description: Bonn-based logistics company providing structured, data-driven fleet and driver services across Germany and Europe.

about.title: About Us
about.values: Reliability · Teamwork · Transparency · Innovation · Data-Driven Growth
